channel.title: [508]How to Make an Item Equipable?[508]
channel.description: Well the title says it all how and what do i do to make a certain item be able to be equiped and how do i change how much bonuses it gives to the player.

item.title: [508]How to Make an Item Equipable?[508]
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

is there a item.cfg in ur servermap is there is thats where u change the bonuses (i think that the order of the data is this: itemid-itemname-itemexamineinfo-shop price -high alch price - low alch price-and than bonuses they follow order of you bonusscreen so thats first attack stat (stab-slash-crush-…) defence than str and as last pray.
adn for making Equipable I don’t know how that is whit 508 but try looking for item.java or item1.java or item"number".java (“number” is for example 2 or 3 or 4 …)

I hope this helped but I have 317 server so I don’t know how it works whit 508.

Read full topic
